channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bank of America says buy these 10 ultra-cheap stocks primed to rebound
Billionaire behind Paramount mega-deal obtaining Israeli residency
I sold $3K in gold via wire transfer, but then the buyer got their bank to reverse the payment. What can I do?
Texas can't put the Ten Commandments in certain school districts' classrooms, judge says
Large Stealth Flying Wing Aircraft Photographed Over China
DeSantis awards posthumous Governor's Medal of Freedom to Jimmy Buffett
item.description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis has posthumously awarded five notable Floridians with the Governor’s Medal of Freedom, one of the state’s highest honors

item.title: Texas can't require Ten Commandments in every public school classroom, judge says
item.description: A federal judge has temporarily blocked Texas from enforcing a new law requiring the Ten Commandments to be posted in every public school classroom

item.title: Rhode Island prosecutor under review after warning 'you're gonna regret this' during arrest
item.description: A Rhode Island prosecutor is under review after police body camera footage recorded her warning officers that they would regret arresting her

item.title: First domino in national redistricting fight likely to fall; Texas GOP poised to vote
item.description: Texas' Republican-led legislature is expected to approve new congressional maps that add five new House seats that the GOP could win

item.title: 9/11 victims' fund architect slams changes to New Hampshire abuse settlement program
item.description: An attorney who helped design the 9/11 victims’ compensation fund says New Hampshire lawmakers have undermined the fairness of a settlement program fo...
